thread.title: Shaq Mocks NBA Player With Doctor Strange Parody Video
thread.title_full: Shaq Mocks NBA Player With Doctor Strange Parody Video

author: Jay Jayson
title: Shaq Mocks NBA Player With Doctor Strange Parody Video
text:
Shaq Mocks NBA Player With Doctor Strange Parody Video Jay Jayson Start Slideshow Slide of 
Retired NBA All-Star Shaquille O'Neal hosts "Shaqtin' a Fool," a weekly segment that airs on TNT's Inside the NBA following the conclusion of whatever game is shown that day. It features clips of professional basketball players looking less-than-professional, such as shooting an air ball, making a silly turnover, or committing a costly foul. 
JaVale McGee, a center for the Golden State Warriors who is averaging 6.1 points and three rebounds this season, has made frequent appearances on the segment. This has upset McGee, who feels as though he is being unfairly targeted by Shaq. 
On Thursday's broadcast, Shaq promised that he would refrain from picking on McGee for the foreseeable future, but later on in the show, he released a Doctor Strange parody video that included a lowlight reel of McGee's game. Brutal! 
After watching the segment, or hearing about it from his teammates, McGee posted a series of nasty messages directed at Shaq in the wee hours of Friday morning. Never backing down from a fight, Shaq fired back his own messages. 
You can view their heated Twitter exchange by clicking on "Start Slideshow." 
MORE: Shaq Backing Out Of His Wrestlemania Match With Big Show? / This Is What Olympian Simone Biles Standing Next To Shaq Looks Like / Shaquille O'Neal , Charles Barkley And Ernie Johnson Meet The Justice League 
From Marvel comes DOCTOR STRANGE, the story of world-famous neurosurgeon Dr. Stephen Strange whose life changes forever after a horrific car accident robs him of the use of his hands. When traditional medicine fails him, he is forced to look for healing, and hope, in an unlikely place – a mysterious enclave known as Kamar-Taj. He quickly learns that this is not just a center for healing but also the front line of a battle against unseen dark forces bent on destroying our reality. Before long Strange – armed with newly acquired magical powers – is forced to choose whether to return to his life of fortune and status or leave it all behind to defend the world as the most powerful sorcerer in existence. Join Strange on his dangerous, mystifying, and totally mind-bending journey. 
Doctor Strange comes to Blu-ray and DVD on February 28. Doctor Strange 2016 ComicBook Composite 82.17 #7 All-Time Comic Movies Average rating
